title: Jester
desc:
Post 2115
- As this card enters your Identity Zone, your **Gloom** level is set to 7.
- Afterwards, you lose 1 **Gloom** each turn this is in your Identity Zone.
- You gain 3 dice per turn, and you may play any number of cards per turn. However, each card requires you to input any die, even if it's not a ðŸŽ² card.
- Each card you draw as a result of **Gloom** will be a ðŸŽ² card.
- As many times as you want each turn, you may discard all cards from your hand that have no more and no less than the specific color or combination of colors that you choose. This only works if you have two or more such cards.
